short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a gray background to Horsehero

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Gray Background" extension designed for horsehero.com offers a lightweight solution to enhance users' visual journey throughout the website. This extension brings about a subtle transformation to the website's backdrop by introducing a consistent, soft gray hue. This cohesive alteration contributes to a harmonized and dependable interface, eradicating any potential diversions or irregularities in the website's layout. This deliberate enhancement empowers users to fully concentrate on the presented content and information.

Utilizing this extension is exceptionally straightforward, requiring no intricate setup. Upon installation, it seamlessly implements the gray background whenever horsehero.com is accessed. It's important to note that the extension operates without gathering or transmitting user data or personal details, and it maintains the website's core functionalities intact.
